title: Lag and Packet Loss
body:
Hi, I'm getting tons of lag recently, especially with the "attempting to reconnect" message.

It was suggested to me to run PacketPro, and it looked like I was seeing ~9% packet loss with ~6% happening at the "ae32-br02.chi01.riotdirect.net" hop, is this going to be on Riot or my ISP?

When I ping other servers, I'm only finding 2-3% packet loss. Any advice would be great!

replies.body:
Since our test servers are designed to reject packets, any packet loss that occurs after hitting our servers should not be considered when troubleshooting packet loss. I suggest running a full-on traceroute using [WinMTR](http://winmtr.net/) and the IP **104.160.131.1**. I recommend running the trace for **5 minutes** before exporting the results as text and pasting them in a reply to me.

Let me know if you have any issues with this.
